description: Displays box plots for the top 10 taxa (by mean relative abundance) at any taxomonmic level.  Stacked bar charts and single taxaon views with statistics are also available.
title: A Relative Abundance Analysis

description: Calculates Shannon, Simpson, Chao1 and ACE diversity metrics for each sample, then displays as a box plot.  Curve can be fit to a dot plot of alpha diversity for longitudinal data.
title: A Alpha Diversity Analysis

description: Calculates Bary-Curtis, Jensen-Shannon, Jaccard and more.  Points are displayed on 2D plot where point color and shape can be mapped to available metadata.
title: A Beta Diversity Analysis

description: Uses DESeq2 to calculate differentially abundant taxa, at any taxonomic level, for a user-selected pairwise comparison.
title: A Differential Abundance Analysis

description: Calculates Spearman correlation between continuous covariates (e.g. age) from a selected set of samples and either taxa or other study variables.
title: A Correlation Analysis
